name: attendance-system
description: - Receives punch logs from attendance devices: `POST /device/punch` - Validates & normalizes payloads - Prevents duplicate punches within a configurable window (default 60s) - Saves logs in MongoDB (`PunchLog` model) - Forwards logs to a simulated CRM endpoint `POST /crm/attendance/punch` - Implements a retry worker to retry failed logs every X seconds (default 10s) up to N times (default 3)
